name: CryptoChaos
description: Welcome to the Crypto Chaos trading room, a place where you will either make or break your fortune! Your portfolio consists of three units of each of the most promising digital currencies and your objective is to capitalise on them through day trading. The prices of the different currencies are projected on large screens in the middle of the trading room, keep an eye on the price to find an upward trend in a coins value and quickly trade other coins that may be on a downwards trend so you can keep making as much capital as possible. The market is open from 9:30am until 4:00pm which is when your session will end. Have fun trading and may your coins take you to the moon!
